title: Expect India to be third largest market among 118 countries: Mercedes-Benz
description: Mercedes-Benz anticipates India becoming its third-largest market in the "Region Overseas" within the next 2-3 years, with expectations of strong demand for luxury vehicles. Currently, India is the fifth-largest market in the region, and Mercedes-Benz plans to add 12 new models, including three battery electric vehicles, this year. The company aims to expand its presence in smaller cities, adding outlets in 10 new locations.
